reviewText:
Product received for free

An Action Adventure Gamehttps://youtu.be/_fwzXRu-pAA
+ Epic background music
+ Challenging obstacles that take a fair bit of precision timing to traverse through
+ Visually the game looks pretty unique, mainly the walls and floor which makes it look like you are staring into a 3D box.

- The game seems unfinished, what are coins for? You get them from teasure chests but they seemingly have no purpose. What does the H-ability do? It typically damages you for random amounts of HP, but the picture shows a fireball looking thing.
- No sound effects
- Recharging your health takes a long amount of time
- Combat is extremely poor, and consists of you just holding and hoping you don't die
- Some levels are quite vague, and overly challenging

Contrary to other reviews I've read, there are 12 levels total.

reviewText:
Fustrating and hard knight game with few annoying things
You are knight that tries to survive in these 5 levels.

First kill all enemies then go and pickup glowing thing from statue and bring it in empty statue.

Pros
Ok music nothing too bad and nothing too amazingCons
Does not save your progress
Boring gameplay
Only 5 levels
Can't see when you are shooting
You can hit from miles away with sword
Can't see what is in chest
little or no sounds
You can die to enemies being dead...
Conclusion: I am trying to survive playing this game so you don't have to....
